messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: SSSUIT SSSENSSSORSSS TO MAX OR YOUL DIE TO DEATH OF DEADNESSS AND WE CANT FIX THAT

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: SSSHAFT MINERSSS GET OFF YOUR ASSS AND SSSTART DIGGING

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in cunt station 88 door subroutines. Severity level of 3. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on the communications traffic on your station, we believe that one of the station's simple animals has developed security level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
General Alert

What the fuck was that?!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to cunt station 88. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Meteor Alert

Meteors have been detected on collision course with the station.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Lemon Damon. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.
